record.id: field.name="final.state" and file.name="slo" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: final.state
record.file.name: slo

brief.brief: A state when the Process Target should stop measuring the process time.

detail.detail: The values for this list reflect the Process State Progressions array in the slamodulecontrol table for the table indicated by the Service Area of the Process Target.

For example, if the SLT's Service Area is "Incidents", the associated table is probsummary. Service Manager displays the Process State Progressions from the "probsummary" slamodulecontrol record in the drop-down list.
